data.question: What is the empirical formula of PCN-9?
What is the crystal system and space group of PCN-9?
At what temperature were the gas adsorption measurements for PCN-9 carried out?
What is the Langmuir surface area of PCN-9?
What is the highest CH4 adsorption enthalpy reported among MOFs, according to the text?
How does the hydrogen uptake of PCN-9 at 77 K and 760 Torr compare to MOF-5?
data.answer: PCN-9 has a higher hydrogen uptake than MOF-5.

data.question: Is the entatic state of metal centers in PCN-9 similar to the active centers in metalloproteins?
Does PCN-9 exhibit reversible gas adsorption?
Is the square-planar μ4-oxo bridge in PCN-9 a common feature in MOFs?
Does the synthesis of PCN-9 involve the use of DMSO?
Is the pore volume of PCN-9 less than 0.6 cm3/g?
Was the Langmuir-Freundlich equation used to fit the gas adsorption isotherms for PCN-9?
Is the enthalpy of adsorption for H2 in PCN-9 lower than that for CH4?
What is the role of the entatic state in PCN-9?
data.answer: To enhance the affinity of metal centers toward gases.

data.question: How does the adsorption enthalpy of PCN-9 for O2 compare to Co exchanged zeolites?
What is the significance of the square-planar μ4-oxo bridge in PCN-9?
data.answer: It is rare and contributes to the unique structure of PCN-9.

data.question: What method was used to calculate the enthalpies of gas adsorption for PCN-9?
data.answer: A modified version of the Clausius-Clapeyron equation.

data.question: What is the significance of the TATB ligand in the synthesis of PCN-9?
data.answer: It contributes to the planar conformation and high thermal stability of PCN-9.

data.question: Does PCN-9 have a higher hydrogen uptake at 77 K and 760 Torr compared to Prussian blue?
Is the solvent accessible volume of PCN-9 greater than 50%?
